project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Create a contact book application allowing users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, while storing these contacts in a JSON file and providing a terminal interface.

task.name: Implement functionality to add a contact
Implement functionality to search for a contact
Implement functionality to update a contact
Implement functionality to delete a contact
Implement functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Implement functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
